title: Homepage Load and Responsive Layout
description: Verify that the homepage loads within 3 seconds on desktop and mobile devices, and that the layout is responsive and visually correct across various screen sizes.

steps.description: Navigate to the homepage URL on a desktop browser.
Verify homepage loads within 3 seconds.
Verify hero section, services overview, and local trust indicators render correctly.
Repeat navigation on multiple mobile devices and screen sizes.
Verify layout responsiveness and correctness on mobile screens.

title: Service Pages Navigation and Content Verification
description: Verify that service area and detailed service pages load correctly and display accurate and complete information about New Construction, Repairs, and Remove & Replace services.

steps.description: Navigate to each service area page (Orlando and other Central Florida cities).
Verify service area information is accurate and properly localized.
Navigate to detailed services pages for New Construction, Repairs, and Remove & Replace.
Verify all service descriptions, builder partnership details, and calls to action are displayed.

title: Interactive Cost Calculator Accuracy and Performance
description: Verify that the cost calculator provides accurate soffit and fascia cost estimates with instant feedback based on user-selected materials and service types, and performs efficiently leveraging WebAssembly.

steps.description: Navigate to the cost calculator page.
Select different material types from the options provided.
Select various service types such as New Construction, Repairs, or Remove & Replace.
Verify that the cost estimate updates instantly upon selection changes.
Validate that cost outputs match expected calculations based on known pricing rules.
Monitor performance to ensure no lag beyond acceptable thresholds.

title: Quote Request Form Validation and Submission
description: Validate that the quote request form correctly validates Central Florida property addresses, supports secure photo uploads, and submits requests successfully with proper confirmations.

steps.description: Navigate to the quote request page.
Enter an invalid address outside Central Florida.
Attempt to submit the form.
Verify form shows validation error for invalid address.
Enter a valid Central Florida address.
Select a service type for the quote.
Upload multiple supported image files for property photos.
Verify files upload securely without errors.
Submit the form.
Verify submission success confirmation is displayed and emails/notifications are sent.

title: AI Chatbot Functional Responses and Escalation
description: Verify that the AI-powered chatbot correctly responds to common customer queries regarding soffit and fascia services and escalates complex queries appropriately.

steps.description: Invoke chatbot on various pages.
Submit common questions about services, pricing, scheduling.
Verify chatbot provides relevant and accurate answers instantly.
Submit complex or uncommon queries.
Verify chatbot escalates to human support or appropriate fallback mechanism.

title: Image Gallery Carousel Functionality and Performance
description: Verify the image gallery carousel displays past project photos correctly with optimized loading and smooth navigation controls.

steps.description: Navigate to the gallery page.
Verify images load with proper resolution and no broken links.
Use carousel navigation controls to browse images.
Verify smooth transitions and responsiveness.
Verify carousel is keyboard navigable and accessible.

title: SEO Verification and Schema Markup
description: Validate the website includes proper local SEO optimizations and schema markup for search engines to increase rankings in Central Florida soffit and fascia services.

steps.description: Use SEO tools and validators on core pages.
Verify presence of relevant keywords targeting Central Florida market.
Validate JSON-LD schema markup is correctly implemented on homepage, services, and local pages.

title: Accessibility Compliance to WCAG 2.1 AA
description: Test that all pages conform to WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility standards, supporting keyboard navigation, screen readers, and other assistive technologies.

steps.description: Navigate through the entire site interface using only keyboard.
Verify all interactive elements are reachable and usable by keyboard.
Test site compatibility with popular screen readers.
Verify correct semantic markup and ARIA attributes provide meaningful screen reader output.
Check color contrast and text size compliance on key UI components.

title: Security and Spam Protection Monitoring
description: Verify AI-based security system properly detects and mitigates spam, bots, and malicious activities across forms and chat systems.

steps.description: Simulate spam and bot attacks on quote request form and chatbot.
Verify that security system detects and blocks malicious submissions.
Verify alerts or logs are generated for administrator review.

title: Admin Dashboard Authentication and Content Management
description: Verify that admin users can securely log into the dashboard, manage content including gallery photos, testimonials, and service details effectively.

steps.description: Attempt to access admin dashboard without authentication.
Verify access is denied and redirected to login.
Log in with valid admin credentials.
Verify successful login and access to dashboard features.
Add, edit, and delete gallery images and customer testimonials.
Verify changes are saved, reflected on the site, and no errors occur.
Update service information content.
Verify content updates visible on relevant pages.

title: Cross-browser Compatibility and Mobile Optimization
description: Validate that the website functions correctly and displays properly across major browsers and mobile devices.

steps.description: Open the site on latest versions of Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge.
Verify consistent UI layout, navigation, and functionality.
Test on multiple mobile devices and browsers.
Verify responsiveness and touch interactions operate flawlessly.

title: Data Privacy Compliance for Forms and Data Handling
description: Verify that all forms and data handling on the site comply with GDPR and CCPA privacy policies, including user consent and data protection.

steps.description: Submit forms such as quote request and contact forms.
Verify privacy consent checkboxes are present and required.
Verify user data is transmitted securely and stored according to privacy policies.
Request data access or deletion via site mechanisms.
Verify system handles privacy requests compliantly.

title: Educational Content Accessibility and Accuracy
description: Verify educational materials including measurement guides, material comparisons, and maintenance tips are accurate, easily accessible, and user-friendly.

steps.description: Navigate to educational content pages.
Verify content is complete, clear, and correctly formatted.
Test access on desktop and mobile devices.
Verify readability, links, and downloadable materials function properly.
